title: Set alias for columns in data set, but Expression Builder shows old column names when selecting the dataset
OB: When setting an alias for columns in a dataset, the Expression Builder still displays the old column names when selecting the dataset.
EB: After setting an alias for columns in a dataset, the Expression Builder should display the updated alias names instead of the old column names when selecting the dataset.
SR:
1. Open the dataset in the data set editor.
2. Set aliases for one or more columns.
3. Open the Expression Builder.
4. Select the dataset in the Expression Builder.
5. Observe that the Expression Builder displays the old column names instead of the assigned aliases.
